import { Slider } from "./Slider"; import "./RoomDetails.css"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { hotels } from "../db"; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import styled from "styled-components"; import NavbarSticky from "../Home/NavbarSticky"; import { FooterTwo } from "../FooterTwo"; // import {Icons} from ".../public/Icons" const Div = styled.div` & header > img { padding: 20px; } `; export function RoomDetails() { const { id } = useParams(); const [pageData, setPageData] = useState([]); const [pageImg, setPageImg] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const data = hotels; const images = data.hotel[id - 1].images; setPageImg(images); // console.log(hotels.hotel); setPageData(data.hotel[id - 1]); }, []); // console.log(pageData.images) console.log(pageImg); return (
